content: For the baseball bat modelling task, is hollowing the interior required?
i didn't knew baseball bats are hollow inside :laughing:
whatever is realistic -- if you can defend it with something showing measurements or a picture, that can work
why does baseball bat tasks suggests to use clone command or pattern tool ?
fixed, copy-paste carry over from the baseball task -- which can benefit from pattern tool.
i didn't do basketball task , i didn't get what you said
